id.description: The unique identifier for the bank account.

object.description: The object type, which is typically 'bank_account'.

account_holder_name.description: The name of the account holder.

account_holder_type.description: The type of account holder, such as individual or company.

account_type.description: The type of bank account, such as checking or savings.

country.description: The country where the bank account is located.

currency.description: The currency of the bank account.

fingerprint.description: A unique identifier for the bank account.

last4.description: The last 4 digits of the bank account number.

metadata.description: Additional information or attributes associated with the bank account.

routing_number.description: The routing number of the bank account.

status.description: The status of the bank account, such as 'verified' or 'pending'.

account.description: The account number associated with the bank account.

updated.description: The timestamp for when the bank account was last updated.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the bank account has been deleted.
